refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: polyfit(x,y,n) finds the coefficients of a polynomial p(x) of degree n that fits the data, p(x(i)) to y(i), in a least-squares sense.
These coefficients are ordered with powers in decreasing order:
[p,s]=polyfit(x,y,n) returns the polynomial coefficients p and a data structure S for use with polyval to produce error estimates on predictions.
